full_threads.body:
Hi Joel,

Question regarding discounting on the platform.

I understand we can provide discounts and this is shown in the summary which the clients can view as they are accepting and we can also go in anytime and look at the discount.

I am wondering if we can get the discount to pull through to Xero when creating the draft invoice for a proposal? Would be great to see the discounts also noted on our Xero invoices.



Kind Regards,

Ben Rookes
